name: Tini design system
description:
The Tiki's Tini Apps design team builds a design system for the Tini App platform based on the Tiki design system. The Tini will help product designers to uniform the user interfaces to focus on a better user experience, deliver ideas and products faster.


If you have questions or suggestions you can reach out to us on the Tini Design community


v1.3

September 30th, 2021

How's your September? Saigon is recovering, and the city plans to resume activities from October 1st.

This month, the Tini team focused on delivering the Food & Beverage template, so our design system has some improvements for the inside structure of the Table, Date field, and List view. Some minor changes for Social post components, and rename Error, Success color token to Negative & Positive color token for more usages.


That's it for September. See ya next month!!!
